name: Image Gallery
backend_requirements: Save images to /uploads directory with unique filenames
Image model: id, filename, original_name, upload_date, file_size
GET /api/images - return list of images with URLs
Validate file type (jpg, png, gif) and size (<5MB)
frontend_requirements: File input with 'Upload' button, show selected filename
Click image to view full size in modal/lightbox
Delete button per image with confirmation
